a contribut to the develop of algol a program languagsimilar in mani respect to algol 60 but incorpor alarg number of improv base on six year experi withthat languag is describ in detail part i consist ofan introduct to the new languag and a summari ofthe chang made to algol 60 togeth with a discussof the motiv behind there vision part ii is arigor definit of the propos languag part iii describ aset of propos standard procedur to be us with thelanguag includ facil for input output cacm june 1966 wirthn hoar c a r ca660601 jb march 3 19789 07 am 1380 5 1421 1421 5 1421 14215 1421 1421 5 1421 1552 5 1421 1693 51421 1781 5 1421 1854 5 1421 1860 5 14212060 5 1421 557 5 1421 123 6 1421 1966 1421 919 6 1421 990 6 1421 1007 61421 1046 6 1421 1131 6 1421 1139 6 14211140 6 1421 1149 6 1421 1184 6 1421 11986 1421 1215 6 1421 1223 6 1421 1265 61421 1303 6 1421 1323 6 1421 1358 6 14211366 6 1421 1366 6 1421 1380 6 1421 13896 1421 1421 6 1421 1421 6 1421 1421 61421 1421 6 1421 1421 6 1421 1421 6 14211421 6 1421 1421 6 1421 1460 6 1421 14626 1421 1463 6 1421 1467 6 1421 1468 61421 1469 6 1421 1471 6 1421 1477 6 14211477 6 1421 1477 6 1421 1491 6 1421 14916 1421 1491 6 1421 1496 6 1421 1496 61421 1531 6 1421 1535 6 1421 1565 6 14211601 6 1421 1602 6 1421 1613 6 1421 16146 1421 1614 6 1421 1626 6 1421 1626 61421 1641 6 1421 1641 6 1421 1748 6 14211749 6 1421 1785 6 1421 1786 6 1421 17876 1421 1788 6 1421 205 6 1421 210 61421 224 6 1421 249 6 1421 1869 6 1421288 6 1421 316 6 1421 378 6 1421 3786 1421 381 6 1421 398 6 1421 2110 61421 11 6 1421 404 6 1421 410 6 1421463 6 1421 464 6 1421 483 6 1421 31846 1421 3184 6 1421 3184 6 1421 3188 61421 584 6 1421 600 6 1421 680 6 1421691 6 1421 731 6 1421 763 6 1421 7996 1421 799 6 1421
